overview: Closeted college Professor Hans Berlin is in a loveless hetero marriage and constantly tempted by the hot, young men in his class. Occasionally though, his students are as hot for Hans as he is for them -- and the frustrated older man is happy to oblige them. Gorgeous teen Troy Accola has daddy issues that Hans is uniquely qualified to address, but closeted school security guard Jaxton Wheeler also wants a piece of teen Troy's tight little hole. Meanwhile, muscle bear Jaxton seduces closeted stud Roman Todd while their clueless girlfriends are away. Enjoy a peek into the secret sex lives of sexually frustrated, closeted men -- and how they satisfy each other's forbidden need for hot, hard cock. Starring Troy Accola, Hans Berlin, Jaxton Wheeler, Roman Todd.
tagline: HE WAS MARRIED TO A WOMAN . . . BUT IN LOVE WITH A MAN.
title: In the Closet 2
